name: rnelshi

body.origin:
|- wcel(crn(c0), csh)
-| wceq(cima(c0, cdm(c0)), crn(c0))
-| wcel(cima(c0, cdm(c0)), csh)
body.pretty:
⊢ ran(c0)∈ SH
⊣ (c0 " dom(c0))= ran(c0)
⊣ (c0 " dom(c0))∈ SH

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crn(c0), csh)
-| wceq(cima(c0, cdm(c0)), crn(c0))
-| wcel(cima(c0, cdm(c0)), csh)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ran(c0)∈ SH
⊣ (c0 " dom(c0))= ran(c0)
⊣ (c0 " dom(c0))∈ SH

body.origin:
|- wcel(cima(c0, cdm(c0)), csh)
-| wcel(c0, clo)
-| wcel(cdm(c0), csh)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 " dom(c0))∈ SH
⊣ c0 ∈ LinOp
⊣ dom(c0)∈ SH

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crn(c0), csh)
-| wcel(c0, clo)
-| wcel(cdm(c0), csh)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ran(c0)∈ SH
⊣ c0 ∈ LinOp
⊣ dom(c0)∈ SH

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdm(c0), csh)
-| wceq(cdm(c0), chba)
-| wcel(chba, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crn(c0), csh)
-| wcel(c0, clo)
-| wceq(cdm(c0), chba)
-| wcel(chba, csh)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ran(c0)∈ SH
⊣ c0 ∈ LinOp
⊣ dom(c0)= ~H
⊣ ~H ∈ SH

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(crn(c0), csh)
-| wcel(c0, clo)
-| wcel(chba, csh)
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)

|- wcel(crn(c0), csh)
-| wcel(c0, clo)
-| wcel(chba, csh)

comment: The range of a linear operator is a subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
